Skip to main content

![](/sites/default/files/2025-09/JAE09981.jpg)

Who We Are

Together with employers and industry partners, we uphold the highest standards for training, issue credentials, support apprentices, fund programs and promote a wide range of rewarding careers in the trades. We are building the most diverse and sustainable workforce in Canada by supporting equitable access to skilled trades and helping British Columbians unlock their potential—creating a world-class workforce, one career journey at a time. 

[ About Our New Name](/introducing-skilledtradesbc)

![](/sites/default/files/2023-08/SKILLED%20TRADES_09132022_150.jpg)

Strategic

Plan

The 3-Year Strategic Plan is responsive to the province’s evolving economy and its labour market needs.

[ Learn More](/strategicplan)

Our

Leadership

Our Board of Directors is committed to continuous improvement and transparent leadership, with a mandate set out in the 2022 Skilled Trades BC Act.

[ Our Leadership](/leadership-team)

![](/sites/default/files/2022-12/careers%20at%20skilledtradesbc.jpg)

Join Our

Team!

We are always on the lookout for highly skilled and committed people who share our passion for supporting the skilled trades. Our employees are continually challenged, offered valuable professional development, and constantly recognized.

[ Careers at SkilledTradesBC](/careers-at-skilledtradesbc)

## 

More Information

#### [Legislation, Bylaws, Policies & Factsheets Policies set out the requirements to guide B.C.’s trades training and apprenticeship system. Bylaws include definitions and listings of approved programs. Learn More](/policies-and-bylaws) #### [Procurement We support business units to procure goods and services in line with our mandate, without bias or personal interest, and we encourage culturally appropriate service delivery to support Indigenous peoples’ participation. Learn More](/procurement) #### [Freedom of Information SkilledTradesBC is committed to timely and transparent communications. In addition to regularly publishing information, we respond to Freedom of Information requests in accordance with B.C.’s Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act (FOIPPA). Learn More](/freedom-of-information) #### [Request for Review Certain decisions made by SkilledTradesBC are eligible for the Request for Review process. This is a formal, comprehensive review of the decision made, overseen by an independent Review Officer and requires submitting an application and supporting information.  Learn More](/request-for-review)
